articles.title: More than 60 dead, at least 1300 missing as severe floods strike Europe - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Heavy flooding in Germany and Belgium turned streams and streets into deadly torrents that swept cars away and caused houses to collapse.
articles.content:
